title: Your True Story: You Know You Are A Typographer When...
content:
... When - excuse me please, but this actually happened to me - you open the toilet door and imagine a vector outline around the bowl, complete with BCP's and Postscript handles!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_0955.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193007/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0955.JPG) | 71.68 KB |
author: Vladimir Tamari

comments.content: Did you flush left or flush right?

Complex script Right-to-left :)  
And yes hrant I then realized I had been working too hard on my fonts.

Clearly a font for a "foot-flusher." Toilets have germs!  
Don
That is why clean outlines are needed!
...when you have a film- noir sort of a nightmare - as I did last night - involving a hero facing enemies and dangers whose presence is manifested in font folders and files!
